###User Defined Function###
_MouseTrap

###Description###
Confine the Mouse Cursor to specified coords.

###Syntax###
#Include <Misc.au3>
_MouseTrap([$iLeft = 0[, $iTop = 0[, $iRight = 0[, $iBottom = 0]]]])

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$iLeft
	Left coord
$iTop
	Top coord
$iRight
	Right coord
$iBottom
	Bottom coord
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: True
Failure: False

###Remarks###
Use _MouseTrap() with no params to release the Mouse Cursor
